summary: This document is an email from Lesley Groff to Paul Moms, confirming a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein at his residence. The email includes details about the time and location of the meeting.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff sent an email to Paul Moms confirming a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
The meeting is scheduled for January 16, 2013, at 4:30 PM.
The location of the meeting is Jeffrey Epstein's home at 9 East 71st Street.
